WorkItem.Description:
Starting with the default ItemCache.xml, and performing an "Update Item Cache from Wowhead", the following items have a change in stats (This list contains 5 items which were wrong in the default file and are now correct due to Jothay's fix -- thank you for the quick fix).  It's unclear if these were hand edited items in the distributed ItemCache or if the parser is acting differently on them now vs. before.
 
[37111] Soul Preserver
BEFORE: 75 Spell Power, 800 Mana cost of next spell reduce (within 15 sec.), 800 Next Healing Spell Mana Cost Reduction (2% on Healing Cast)
AFTER: 75 Spell Power
 
[40207] Sigil of Awareness
BEFORE: 336 Bonus Obliterate Damage, 189 Bonus Scourge Strike Damage, 315 Bonus Death Strike Damage
AFTER: 336 Bonus Obliterate Damage, 189 Bonus Scourge Strike Damage, 31 Bonus Death Strike Damage
 
[40337] Libram of Resurgence
BEFORE: 141 Consecration Spell Power
AFTER:
